title: Histone lactylation-related genes correlate with the molecular patterns and functions of cancer-associated fibroblasts and have significant clinical implications in clear cell renal cell carcinoma
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Weiyu Kong, Jiaxin He, Qinyao Zhou, Xin Zhou, Xiyi Wei, Yonglin Yang, Yiwen Mei, Shuai Wang, Xi Zhang, Bing Yao, Yulin Yue, Jiali Xu, Minjun Jiang, Chen Xu
